recipe_data.title: Slow Cooker Beef Stroganoff
recipe_data.description: Recipe video above. The slow cooked version of Beef Stroganoff! Fall apart beef smothered in a creamy Stroganoff sauce with buttery garlic mushrooms, it's made with economical stewing beef yet tastes like a million dollars! 3 cook methods provided: stove, slow cooker or pressure cooker/instant pot* Recipe update: pursuant to some readers having difficulties with flour lumps, the steps have been updated to make it easier!

ingredients.name: beef chuck or other stewing beef
large onion
ingredients.notes: halved then sliced into 1 cm / 2/5" slices

ingredients.name: Pasta, wide egg noodles, mashed potato

instructions.title: Season beef
instructions.description: Pat beef dry then sprinkle with all the salt and pepper.

instructions.title: Brown beef
instructions.description: Heat 1 tbsp oil in a large heavy based pot or skillet* over high heat. Add beef in a single layer (not squished) and brown aggressively all over - 4 minutes or so. Remove and repeat with rest of beef, adding more oil as needed.

instructions.title: Sauté aromatics
instructions.description: Let the pot cool down a bit then return to stove. Melt half the butter, then cook garlic and onion for 3 minutes until softened.

instructions.title: Add flour
instructions.description: Sprinkle the flour across the surface, then stir. Add the mustard, and stir - it will look gluey, that's ok, it will dissolve.

instructions.title: Add stock
instructions.description: While stirring, pour in about half the beef stock then mix so the flour mixture dissolves into the liquid. It will thicken quite quickly into a gravy-like consistency .Switch to a whisk if needed, to make it lump free. Then add remaining stock, stir well, scraping the bottom of the pot, and bring to simmer. Cook using chosen method below.

instructions.title: Slow cooker
instructions.description: Transfer all liquid into slow cooker. Add beef, then slow cook 8 hours on LOW or 5 hours on HIGH.

instructions.title: Stove
instructions.description: Add beef into pot. Cover with lid and adjust heat to low/medium low so the it's simmering gently. Simmer 2 hrs (check at 1.5 hrs) until beef beef falls apart easily.

instructions.title: Instant pot
instructions.description: SKIP FLOUR, follow Note 5 Gluten Free option. 40 minutes on high, same method as slow cooker.

instructions.title: Other pressure cookers
instructions.description: 40 minutes on high, same method as slow cooker.

instructions.title: Garlic Butter Mushrooms
instructions.description: Melt half the butter in a large skillet over high heat. Add half the mushrooms and cook until almost golden (~3 minutes). Add half the garlic, salt and pepper, cook until golden. Remove, repeat with remaining butter, mushrooms and garlic.

instructions.title: Mix sour cream
instructions.description: Mix sour cream with 1.5 cups of liquid from slow cooker (Note 2), then gently stir into stew - careful, the beef is delicate!

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Serve over noodles, pasta or mashed potato, sprinkled with chives!
